usage_record_uri.description: The URI of the associated usage record.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the trigger was last updated.

date_fired.description: The date and time when the trigger was last fired.

friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name for the trigger.

uri.description: The URI of the usage trigger resource.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier for the account associated with the usage trigger.

callback_method.description: The HTTP method used for callback notifications.

trigger_by.description: The attribute by which the trigger condition is evaluated.

sid.description: The unique identifier for the trigger.

current_value.description: The current value for the trigger condition.

date_created.description: The date and time when the trigger was created.

callback_url.description: The URL where callback notifications are sent.

recurring.description: Indicates if the trigger is set to recur periodically.

usage_category.description: The category under which the usage falls.

trigger_value.description: The value that triggers the condition.

api_version.description: The version of the Twilio API used for the trigger.
